argument.description: Values that must resolve to non-negative integers.

returnType: The BITAND function returns an integer value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL BITAND function returns an integer representing an AND operation on the bits of expr1 and expr2.
sample:
BITAND(5,3)
Result: 1

BITAND(15,7)
Result: 7

BITAND(5,2)
Result: 0

BITAND(5,0)
Result: 0

BITAND(6,2)
Result: 2
